Title: Khakee
Writer: Shridhar Raghavan, Rajkumar Santoshi (dialogue), Rajkumar Santoshi
Actors: Amitabh Bachchan, Akshay Kumar, Ajay Devgn, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
Plot: A team of police force escorts an alleged terrorist from Chandangarh to Mumbai. However their trip turns into a deadly survival when an ex-cop tries to stop them to reach Mumbai.
